title: Client Won't Load
body: Every time I open League of Legends it seems normal. The client appears when I click launch, but it won't stop loading. I've tried running it as an administrator, uninstalling and installing the game again, repairing it, and even leaving it loading several days at a time. But nothing works. Please help.

replies.body: You might have a security setting preventing the client from launching.  Running as admin might help, but there are a few more steps to try.   More specifically, run through the instructions in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings and allow access.  Let me know if you have any questions.
